App Name: Whisk Package Name: com.foodient.whisk

ğŸ“± Brief: Whisk is an innovative cooking and meal planning app designed to streamline the process from inspiration to dine. With an emphasis on community sharing and convenience, it allows users to gather and manage recipes, plan meals efficiently, and transform recipe ingredients into shopping lists with ease. It stands out with free meal planning and integrated grocery delivery, making it an all-in-one solution for modern home cooks.
